contents: Article 3 (Composition) ① The Election Fair Committee shall be composed of the following members. 1. 1 chairperson 2. Up to 2 vice chairpersons *3. 7 or more and 11 or less (including the chairman and vice-chairman) ② The Election Fair Committee shall have one secretary, who is appointed by the President of the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as the ‘Chairman’) from among the staff of the Sports Council. ③ The members of the Election Fair Committee shall be composed of the following persons: 1. A person who has worked as a judge, prosecutor, or lawyer for more than 5 years 2. A person who has worked at a level 4 or higher in a national or local government 3. A person who has worked in a sports-related organization for more than 20 years
